= Introduction =

This page lists the various meetings held by the OBO Foundry Operations Committee. Access to minutes of committee meetings is restricted to committee members.

See the [OBOCalendar] for scheduled meetings.

= Details =

== OFOC meetings ==

Chairs are assigned on a rotating basis. The chair should create agenda, host call, clean up minutes, etc. We have been keeping minutes using Google Docs in the [https://drive.google.com/?tab=mo&authuser=0#folders/0B968UM0a5noaUmxPWEJESi1oRzg "obo-operations-meetings"] shared folder (access restricted to committee members). If you are unable to chair the call assigned to you, please find someone to take your place or trade with you.
